refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the name of the current element

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the name of the current node. Calling this function is the same as accessing the tagname property, or calling DomElement->node_name of the current node.

example.title: Getting the node name
example.programlisting:
<?php

include("example.inc");

if (!$dom = domxml_open_mem($xmlstr)) {
    echo "Error while parsing the document\n";
    exit;
}

$root = $dom->document_element();
echo $root->tagname();   // chapter
echo $root->tagname;     // chapter
echo $root->node_name(); // chapter


?>
